fgs - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
instance of FirebaseGroupSystem, communicates with firebase with stuff associated with group management(join, leave, init etc.)
FirebaseGroupSystem - Class in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
in my opinion the most important class in the application.
FirebaseGroupSystem(AdapterManager, UIHelper, Activity) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
we initialize most of the variables and all the listeners, we call DB_InitCurrentUser
FirebaseHelper - Class in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
This class doe's almost nothing.
FirebaseHelper(AdapterManager, UIHelper, Activity) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
initializes the constants and fgs,fls
FirebaseLocationSystem - Class in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
Communicates with firebase in all things that are associated with locations of users(retrieve others locations, update mine); One of the 3 FirebaseCommunication classes - manages work that has to do with the location system
FirebaseLocationSystem(AdapterManager) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem
really nothing special, 2 rows that initialize the 2 variables
FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName - Class in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
small struct(class) that holds data we want to store about some user for future use; the data is the latitude,longitude, groupUser's name and color; explanation why color is float view in color variable docs of the struct
FirebaseMailSystem - Class in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
Contains logic of doing actions associated with mails and the firebase; One of the 3 FirebaseCommunication classes - manages work that has to do with the mail system
FirebaseMailSystem(AdapterManager, UIHelper, Activity, EditText) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseMailSystem
a very long constructor(about 200 rows); at beginning initializes variables, then adds a lot of listeners; the main one's are that if we click on custom mail, we can write a reply mail to the sender; if we long-click on some mail - the mail is removed from the mail list(deleted); and also adds simple mail listeners to updates in the firebase
FirebaseMailSystem.MAIL_TYPE - Enum in com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication
types of mails that the app will create by itself without involving the user
floatingArrowBack - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper
 
floatingEye - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper
 
floatingPlus - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper
 
fls - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseHelper
instance of FirebaseLocationSystem, communicates with firebase with things that include location - retrieve location, get location etc
fms - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseGroupSystem
FirebaseMailSystem; part that manages stuff that has to do with mails
focusCamera(GroupUser) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
move camera to the place the GroupUser located; if place unknown do nothing
from - Variable in class com.example.mapnector.DBStorage.Mail
